The small rechargeable batteries works good for transporting energy by hand, but not for automatic storage or buffering. To reach this I connected some of this batteries to a Battery Box.

This storage unit can depending on the settings act as energy Collector, Source or Buffer. Furthermore I added slots inside the machine for manually charge and discharge as well as for a permanent improvement of the capacity (12 Slots).
Settings: I can set any side as energy input or energy output by using the "Logistics Editor".
